scripts.copy:env:win: copy DeliverUS-Backend\.env.example DeliverUS-Backend\.env && copy DeliverUS-Frontend\.env.example DeliverUS-Frontend\.env
scripts.copy:env:bash: cp DeliverUS-Backend/.env.example DeliverUS-Backend/.env &&  cp DeliverUS-Frontend/.env.example DeliverUS-Frontend/.env
scripts.install:backend: npm install && cd DeliverUS-Backend && npm install
scripts.test:backend: npm run migrate:backend && cd DeliverUS-Backend && npm test
scripts.install:all:win: npm run copy:env:win && npm run install:backend && npm run migrate:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:all:bash: npm run copy:env:bash && npm run install:backend && npm run migrate:backend && npm run install:frontend
